creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Piggy GO, roll your dice and travel around the world! Global players are with you!
Rolling dice, attacking cities, looting gold, testing your fate, and getting the jackpot: Massive travel prizes are awaiting you!

FUN ACTIVITIES
- Tournaments: Join the fierce competition to fight for the first prize!
- Go Jackpot: Collect tickets and go to the casino, the rewards are within your grasp!
- Go City: Build your city with hard work to get a big bonus!
- Lili's Kitchen: Prepare a delicious meal with your heart!

FEATURES
- Board: Use the dice to obtain raids, attacks, fates, etc.
- Card Collection: Representative objects for every country.
- Buildings: Cute people, architecture and animals are created by you.

COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
- Send and receive dice from Facebook friends.
- Trade cards and foods to complete your set.

SKINS
Cool or cute? Elegant or sexy? Gorgeous or simple? Characters and dice can be adjusted to suit your personality!

Follow Piggy GO on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel

Love travelling and adventures?
Download for free🔥 to get the full experience!

title: Piggy GO - Clash of Coin

container.value: Suite 1701-02， 17/F,. FWD FINANCIAL CENTRE 308, DES VOEUX ROAD CENTRAL, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Piggy GO, roll your dice and travel around the world! Global players are with you!
Rolling dice, attacking cities, looting gold, testing your fate, and getting the jackpot: Massive travel prizes are awaiting you!

FUN ACTIVITIES
- Tournaments: Join the fierce competition to fight for the first prize!
- Go Jackpot: Collect tickets and go to the casino, the rewards are within your grasp!
- Go City: Build your city with hard work to get a big bonus!
- Lili's Kitchen: Prepare a delicious meal with your heart!

FEATURES
- Board: Use the dice to obtain raids, attacks, fates, etc.
- Card Collection: Representative objects for every country.
- Buildings: Cute people, architecture and animals are created by you.

COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
- Send and receive dice from Facebook friends.
- Trade cards and foods to complete your set.

SKINS
Cool or cute? Elegant or sexy? Gorgeous or simple? Characters and dice can be adjusted to suit your personality!

Follow Piggy GO on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel

Love travelling and adventures?
Download for free🔥 to get the full experience!

creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Piggy GO, roll your dice and travel around the world! Global players are with you!
Rolling dice, attacking cities, looting gold, testing your fate, and getting the jackpot: Massive travel prizes are awaiting you!

FUN ACTIVITIES
- Tournaments: Join the fierce competition to fight for the first prize!
- Go Jackpot: Collect tickets and go to the casino, the rewards are within your grasp!
- Go City: Build your city with hard work to get a big bonus!
- Lili's Kitchen: Prepare a delicious meal with your heart!

FEATURES
- Board: Use the dice to obtain raids, attacks, fates, etc.
- Card Collection: Representative objects for every country.
- Buildings: Cute people, architecture and animals are created by you.

COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
- Send and receive dice from Facebook friends.
- Trade cards and foods to complete your set.

SKINS
Cool or cute? Elegant or sexy? Gorgeous or simple? Characters and dice can be adjusted to suit your personality!

Follow Piggy GO on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel

Love travelling and adventures?
Download for free🔥 to get the full experience!

Board with a new look for new players to experience.

container.value: Suite 1701-02， 17/F,. FWD FINANCIAL CENTRE 308, DES VOEUX ROAD CENTRAL, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Piggy GO, roll your dice and travel around the world! Global players are with you!
Rolling dice, attacking cities, looting gold, testing your fate, and getting the jackpot: Massive travel prizes are awaiting you!

FUN ACTIVITIES
- Tournaments: Join the fierce competition to fight for the first prize!
- Go Jackpot: Collect tickets and go to the casino, the rewards are within your grasp!
- Go City: Build your city with hard work to get a big bonus!
- Lili's Kitchen: Prepare a delicious meal with your heart!

FEATURES
- Board: Use the dice to obtain raids, attacks, fates, etc.
- Card Collection: Representative objects for every country.
- Buildings: Cute people, architecture and animals are created by you.

COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
- Send and receive dice from Facebook friends.
- Trade cards and foods to complete your set.

SKINS
Cool or cute? Elegant or sexy? Gorgeous or simple? Characters and dice can be adjusted to suit your personality!

Follow Piggy GO on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel

Love travelling and adventures?
Download for free🔥 to get the full experience!

title: Piggy GO - Clash of Coin

container.value: Suite 1701-02， 17/F,. FWD FINANCIAL CENTRE 308, DES VOEUX ROAD CENTRAL, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
🔥 Piggy Go - A Blast of a Board Game 🔥
The hottest board game to play with friends! Play as your favorite Piggy character and roll your dice to race across the board. Go Attack, Go Steal, Go explore new boards to collect all the prizes.
Enjoy these features:
- Attack towns to slow down other travellers
- Break into the bank and steal from the Vault
- Earn Coins to build towns around the world
- Race friends to Win huge rewards
- Trade Cards to complete the Reward Sets

Blast your Piggy Friends!
💣Use your cannon to blast your Piggy friends and Steal their treasure. Attack their towns to slow them down as you race around the world! Beware of incoming attacks, roll the dice to earn Shields and protect your coins.
Break Into the Vault!
🔑 Loot the key to break into the Vault and claim the Super Bonus! Steal all the coins from the money bags💰 in the bank and make your getaway. Earn your treasure with each lucky roll!
Travel to See the World!
🎈 Go Race around the world. Build up each new town on your list and and race to compete to become Piggy Go's great world traveller. Win the race and collect the Dice Jackpot!
Send Robbers to Jail!
🚓 Catch robbers on your board trying to steal your coins. Board Patrol is there to protect your hard earned treasures from your cute friends and cuter foes. Don't let them escape with the loot!
Collect all the Cards
🎲 Roll your dice to Win treasure chests of coins, dice and travel cards. Collect all the cards in the set to Win powerful prizes. With each new destination you travel, your card set rewards will be even greater.

Visit your Friend's Board
Join the Facebook community to make new friends, then visit their board in game!
Follow Piggy Go for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2100495096686698
Join the Community, Let's Play A Board Game!

Are you having problems?
Please contact us by sending a direct message to our Facebook Fan Page above, or email us at piggygo@forevernine.com.

The hottest board game to play with friends! Play as your favorite Piggy character and roll your dice to race across the board. Go Attack, Go Steal, Go explore new boards to collect all the prizes.
Enjoy these features:
- Attack towns to slow down other travellers
- Break into the bank and steal from the Vault
- Earn Coins to build towns around the world
- Race friends to Win huge rewards
- Trade Cards to complete the Reward Sets

Blast your Piggy Friends!
💣Use your cannon to blast your Piggy friends and Steal their treasure. Attack their towns to slow them down as you race around the world! Beware of incoming attacks, roll the dice to earn Shields and protect your coins.
Break Into the Vault!
🔑 Loot the key to break into the Vault and claim the Super Bonus! Steal all the coins from the money bags💰 in the bank and make your getaway. Earn your treasure with each lucky roll!
Travel to See the World!
🎈 Go Race around the world. Build up each new town on your list and and race to compete to become Piggy Go's great world traveller. Win the race and collect the Dice Jackpot!
Send Robbers to Jail!
🚓 Catch robbers on your board trying to steal your coins. Board Patrol is there to protect your hard earned treasures from your cute friends and cuter foes. Don't let them escape with the loot!
Collect all the Cards
🎲 Roll your dice to Win treasure chests of coins, dice and travel cards. Collect all the cards in the set to Win powerful prizes. With each new destination you travel, your card set rewards will be even greater.

Visit your Friend's Board
Join the Facebook community to make new friends, then visit their board in game!
Follow Piggy Go for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2100495096686698
Join the Community, Let's Play A Board Game!

Are you having problems?
Please contact us by sending a direct message to our Facebook Fan Page above, or email us at piggygo@forevernine.com.

New buff -- Gold Rush is coming! Holiday special! Grab this chance for Gold to roll in!
New! Deluxe rewards is online! Check how much you can gain after full attendance!
Recollection cards and character system optimized! A better game experience is waiting for you.

title: Piggy GO - Clash of Coin

container.value: Suite 1701-02， 17/F,. FWD FINANCIAL CENTRE 308, DES VOEUX ROAD CENTRAL, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
🔥 Piggy Go - A Blast of a Board Game 🔥
The hottest board game to play with friends! Play as your favorite Piggy character and roll your dice to race across the board. Go Attack, Go Steal, Go explore new boards to collect all the prizes.
Enjoy these features:
- Attack towns to slow down other travellers
- Break into the bank and steal from the Vault
- Earn Coins to build towns around the world
- Race friends to Win huge rewards
- Trade Cards to complete the Reward Sets

Blast your Piggy Friends!
💣Use your cannon to blast your Piggy friends and Steal their treasure. Attack their towns to slow them down as you race around the world! Beware of incoming attacks, roll the dice to earn Shields and protect your coins.
Break Into the Vault!
🔑 Loot the key to break into the Vault and claim the Super Bonus! Steal all the coins from the money bags💰 in the bank and make your getaway. Earn your treasure with each lucky roll!
Travel to See the World!
🎈 Go Race around the world. Build up each new town on your list and and race to compete to become Piggy Go's great world traveller. Win the race and collect the Dice Jackpot!
Send Robbers to Jail!
🚓 Catch robbers on your board trying to steal your coins. Board Patrol is there to protect your hard earned treasures from your cute friends and cuter foes. Don't let them escape with the loot!
Collect all the Cards
🎲 Roll your dice to Win treasure chests of coins, dice and travel cards. Collect all the cards in the set to Win powerful prizes. With each new destination you travel, your card set rewards will be even greater.

Visit your Friend's Board
Join the Facebook community to make new friends, then visit their board in game!
Follow Piggy Go for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2100495096686698
Join the Community, Let's Play A Board Game!

Are you having problems?
Please contact us by sending a direct message to our Facebook Fan Page above, or email us at piggygo@forevernine.com.

2. Optimized the promotion image interface

title: Piggy GO - Clash of Coin

container.value: Suite 1701-02， 17/F,. FWD FINANCIAL CENTRE 308, DES VOEUX ROAD CENTRAL, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
🔥 Piggy Go - A Blast of a Board Game 🔥
The hottest board game to play with friends! Play as your favorite Piggy character and roll your dice to race across the board. Go Attack, Go Steal, Go explore new boards to collect all the prizes.
Enjoy these features:
- Attack towns to slow down other travellers
- Break into the bank and steal from the Vault
- Earn Coins to build towns around the world
- Race friends to Win huge rewards
- Trade Cards to complete the Reward Sets

Blast your Piggy Friends!
💣Use your cannon to blast your Piggy friends and Steal their treasure. Attack their towns to slow them down as you race around the world! Beware of incoming attacks, roll the dice to earn Shields and protect your coins.
Break Into the Vault!
🔑 Loot the key to break into the Vault and claim the Super Bonus! Steal all the coins from the money bags💰 in the bank and make your getaway. Earn your treasure with each lucky roll!
Travel to See the World!
🎈 Go Race around the world. Build up each new town on your list and and race to compete to become Piggy Go's great world traveller. Win the race and collect the Dice Jackpot!
Send Robbers to Jail!
🚓 Catch robbers on your board trying to steal your coins. Board Patrol is there to protect your hard earned treasures from your cute friends and cuter foes. Don't let them escape with the loot!
Collect all the Cards
🎲 Roll your dice to Win treasure chests of coins, dice and travel cards. Collect all the cards in the set to Win powerful prizes. With each new destination you travel, your card set rewards will be even greater.

Visit your Friend's Board
Join the Facebook community to make new friends, then visit their board in game!
Follow Piggy Go for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2100495096686698
Join the Community, Let's Play A Board Game!

Are you having problems?
Please contact us by sending a direct message to our Facebook Fan Page above, or email us at piggygo@forevernine.com.

title: Piggy GO - Clash of Coin

container.value: Suite 1701-02， 17/F,. FWD FINANCIAL CENTRE 308, DES VOEUX ROAD CENTRAL, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Forever9 Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Piggy Go🐷!
-This is a BOARD&SOCIAL game.
-You can play the game for free and enjoy socializing and playing in a variety of ways!
-You can roll the dice on your board, steal gold coins, attack friends, teleport to your friends' boards and say Hello!
-Collect gold coins to build and upgrade your town and build your sky city!
-There's even more colorful features and activities, cards, collecting, socializing, competitions, character development and everything in between!
-In this crazy board game, anything is possible!

Colorful Board
Throwing DICE will yield treasures, which may be the following events!
- 💰Gold Coins💰: Gold coins are used to build towns and LEVEL UP！
- 🤑Raid from VAULT🤑: Epic treasures are often hidden in the VAULT, and if you're lucky you can trigger the Super Wheel, making you rich overnight!
- 💣Attack the Enemy💣: Defeat your enemies, take back the treasure that should be yours!
- 🚒RV🚒: Drive your 🚒RV to visit your friends' houses, help each other and upgrade together!
- ✡Mysterious events✡: There are some mysterious events hidden on the board, what is it?

Collecting events
- Collect 🎴Cards to get rich treasures and speed up the town upgrade! Also each town upgrade brings better treasures, better enjoy the thrill of collecting!
- Collect 🍗Ingredients, make a feast and get the treasure!

🐷Character Development
- You can unlock and upgrade your 🐷character to increase your earnings by Raid, Attack, and RV, and the higher your character level is, the more treasure you can get from per event!
- There are also colorful fashions, change your image as you like and be the best looking kid in the piggy bank!

👩🏼‍🤝‍👩🏻Friendship interaction👩🏼‍🤝‍👩🏻
Online groups and in-game unions trade cards and ingredients to speed up your collection! Join our interactive Facebook community, and we'll all play the game together!
Follow Piggy Go for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2100495096686698
Join the Community, Let's Play A Board Game!

Are you having problems?
Please contact us by sending a direct message to our Facebook Fan Page above, or email us at piggygo@forevernine.com.

-This is a BOARD&SOCIAL game.
-You can play the game for free and enjoy socializing and playing in a variety of ways!
-You can roll the dice on your board, steal gold coins, attack friends, teleport to your friends' boards and say Hello!
-Collect gold coins to build and upgrade your town and build your sky city!
-There's even more colorful features and activities, cards, collecting, socializing, competitions, character development and everything in between!
-In this crazy board game, anything is possible!

Colorful Board
Throwing DICE will yield treasures, which may be the following events!
- 💰Gold Coins💰: Gold coins are used to build towns and LEVEL UP！
- 🤑Raid from VAULT🤑: Epic treasures are often hidden in the VAULT, and if you're lucky you can trigger the Super Wheel, making you rich overnight!
- 💣Attack the Enemy💣: Defeat your enemies, take back the treasure that should be yours!
- 🚒RV🚒: Drive your 🚒RV to visit your friends' houses, help each other and upgrade together!
- ✡Mysterious events✡: There are some mysterious events hidden on the board, what is it?

Collecting events
- Collect 🎴Cards to get rich treasures and speed up the town upgrade! Also each town upgrade brings better treasures, better enjoy the thrill of collecting!
- Collect 🍗Ingredients, make a feast and get the treasure!

🐷Character Development
- You can unlock and upgrade your 🐷character to increase your earnings by Raid, Attack, and RV, and the higher your character level is, the more treasure you can get from per event!
- There are also colorful fashions, change your image as you like and be the best looking kid in the piggy bank!

👩🏼‍🤝‍👩🏻Friendship interaction👩🏼‍🤝‍👩🏻
Online groups and in-game unions trade cards and ingredients to speed up your collection! Join our interactive Facebook community, and we'll all play the game together!
Follow Piggy Go for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2100495096686698
Join the Community, Let's Play A Board Game!

Are you having problems?
Please contact us by sending a direct message to our Facebook Fan Page above, or email us at piggygo@forevernine.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Dear, did you know that Piggy Go has reached an important milestone?
It's been 6 years since we were born, 2191 days and nights, and we've gone through it together!
We've witnessed the birth of new gameplay after new gameplay on the soil of Piggy Go!
Today, we welcome yet another brand new feature - Pipi's Puzzle Shop - and look forward to meeting you for the first time!
Are you ready for the new era!
